h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: Past the Shrine, the path will lead into the cells, and a long tunnel through the dark. Up ahead, be wary of a Yaksha Archer who will try and bait you into charging him, only for a Cyan Bat above him to divebomb you from behind with its ice attack.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Lower Pagoda (Level 1)'.
The content is as follows:
Past the Shrine, the path will lead into the cells, and a long tunnel through the dark. Up ahead, be wary of a Yaksha Archer who will try and bait you into charging him, only for a Cyan Bat above him to divebomb you from behind with its ice attack.
